lines.Sulpicius: "Gentlemen, I'm taking my leave from the bathhouse."
"Be sure to make your way back before it before late."

lines.Volesus: "It's been valuable getting to know the others we talked to today."
"I'd like to came back here more often."
"As long as you feel up to it, that is."

lines.Vitus: "I agree. Moments like this brings me back to when we were younger."

lines.Volesus: "Don't reminisce on me too much, I'm happy enough with my empty thoughts."
"Although... I wouldn't mind if this moment lingered."
